title: Replace FUNDGROWTH logo asset with uploaded logo.png

requirements.summary: Overwrite the existing generated FUNDGROWTH logo asset with the uploaded logo.png so header, footer, and all marketing pages display the updated logo via the same immutable path.
acceptanceCriteria: The static asset file frontend/public/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png is updated to match the uploaded logo.png (no additional backend routing).
Site header renders the updated logo via src="/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png" and it is visible on all pages where the header appears.
Site footer renders the updated logo via src="/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png" and it is visible on all pages where the footer appears.
When deployed, the logo served at https://fundgrowth-7y2.caffeine.xyz/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png shows the updated image.

file_operations.description: Replace/overwrite this static asset with the provided uploaded image (workspace asset: logo.png) while keeping the exact filename and path unchanged so all existing references (e.g., header/footer using src "/assets/generated/fundgrowth-logo.dim_512x192.png") automatically show the new logo.
